Reviews.Title: Another fantastic Panasonic Product
Reviews.Author: J. Blais
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for the bedroom. It has a fantastic picture and great sound quality. One great feature is the automatic picture adjustment based on the room ambient lighting, saves having to mess around with the picture when you flip on the side table lamp. Also the factory color presets actually support the intended display, example: cinema setting looks more like film.The only thing this set doesn't have that I would have like is an IP/Ethernet port. Otherwise I am extremely happy. Plenty of HDMI ports too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: William R. Drake
Reviews.Content: After trying two other flat screen TVs and studying different models in showrooms and on the the web, my wife and I gave this model a try. My wife can be very sensitive to the intensity of an LCD TV picture and one thing she likes about this TV is that is has great adjustments for contrast, brightness, etc. In particular, the "Cinema" setting tones the brightness down and gives good picture clarity. She can also select a picture size or formatting that makes videos, widescreen or full screen DVDs, etc., all look good. Furthermore, there is no noticeable blurring. Overall the quality of the picture is superb, and it was worth paying a little more for the 1080p. Even TV programs not broadcast in high-def look great. In addition, unlike other TVs, the speakers provide sound of sufficient volume and excellent quality. I also like that it has plenty of inputs (including 3 HDMI, 1 component, and 2 composite inputs). Its ability to interface with SD cards and computers is also neat. And, in my limited experience, Panasonic has excellent customer service, with personnel who, in general, are more knowledgeable than most I have talked with at Samsung in regards to that company's products. My only complaint is that the only audio output on this TV is digital/optical (for new "home entertainment" systems), which, apparently, is the direction newer LCD TVs this size and up are going. Sometimes I need to use headphones when I am playing something to which my wife does not want to listen. In order to do this I connect my Blu-Ray/VHS/or satellite box output to the input of a little 2 watt amplifier I have and run the headphones off of that, using the amplifier's volume control, with the TV volume on "mute". I would like for this TV to have a 1/8" audio output. In spite of that, in my opinion it is worth 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: M. J. Kessler
Reviews.Content: TV now works great.  However, it arrived with a defect on the screen - three highly visible light blue dots (1/4 to 1/8 inch in diameter) about 9 inches apart in the center of the screen plus a pattern of tiny light blue dots that looked like the milky way.  Panasonic referred me to their authorized service center where the TV was repaired (replaced the panel).

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price, Easy Set Up
Reviews.Author: DC-LA
Reviews.Content: Took me a long time to decide on which TV to buy, started @ COSTCO - but all the TVs were not rated well, only 720p, etc.  Came across this Panasonic (afte find a similar one - but was only 720p).....reviews were great, price as well.  I kept noticing that Amazon could Not keep them in stock (another good sign - of demand)....also price was going down.....i finally grabbed one at $406 from Amazon - it was out of stock at the time, but within 1 week it was shipped to me!Set up was a breeze, including putting on the mount.So far A++++

Reviews.Title: A Nice TV
Reviews.Author: R. D. Trbovich
Reviews.Content: I'm am very pleased with my Purchase.  The TV is great. I particularly like the SD slot, which enables me to review or display a slide show of pictures from my digital camera.  Delivery was prompt and set up was very easy.

Reviews.Title: 32" High Quality + Hi-Def + 1080p, makes this Panasonic a real BARGAIN!
Reviews.Author: D M Pax "Kahuna"
Reviews.Content: ~ Our ideal location - Bought as a replacement for a Sharp AQOUS, that was in one of our Masters suites. Was Wall-mounted using this Omni-mount, go to: [...]Both the Panasonic & Omni-Mount Look Fabulous!Model - This Panasonic's 32-inch VIERA TC-L32U22 LCD HDTV, is the top-of-line U22 Series (there's 3 Versions), in the LCD Class, before you get into the Plasma's.SetUp - Digital cable only, with few HD Channels, and a Sony PSP 3 as the default Blu-ray DVD & game player.Audio-Video TIP - Whether, I'm setting up a Basic TV & DVD Player or something more Advanced, I found a Movie that has lot's of ACTION & SOUND (Dolby 5.1), whether it's on a Widescreen DVD or on a Blu-ray, I like to Use it to 'Tweak' my TV's MODE (Cinema, Game, Custom, etc) & Sound, as well, as Check for any Video stutters and/or 'artifacts'.The movie, 'Flight of The Phoenix', circa 2006. Great Soundtrack too!- Use the Blu-ray player's MENU, go to the 3rd(?) SCENE, where they board the plane ... turn up the Sound, step back and enjoy the Ride!PRO's - Highlights:* PRICE - bought it when it was on-sale for only 399.00 + free ship, plus no taxes.* 1080p resolution, 24P Playback function for superb imagery from 24-frame movies on DVD and Blu-ray Disc.* PIcture Results - Crisp, Clear, Bright Images, with an ultra-wide viewing angle of 178-degree's.* Colors - Deep & Rich on the Cool-side, which is a Panasonic trademark.* Contrast - Bright & Clean.* Automatic Ambient Light Sensor*  Inputs: 3 HDMI & 1 digital audio output - Important to me!* In Plane Switching (IPS) for an ultra-wide viewing angle and higher moving picture resolution that results in clear, bright images.- Translation - Plays well with PSP 3 or XBox in rendering fast moving images, without stutter and/or diminishes Video artifacts.* VIERA Image Viewer feature, which enables you to play slideshows of JPEG images stored on SD memory cards. - Have not used this feature yet.CON's:* No headphone jack* No BlueTooth, ... OK, perhaps in the FUTURE, U Feel ME, Panasonic?

Reviews.Title: This TV makes me happy!!
Reviews.Author: Roselyn Tyson
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV a little over a week now. Kudos to Amazon for prompt delivery. I bought it for my bedroom. Set up was a breeze. After setting up the time/date and language features, I ran the channel scan (antenna set up). The scan found a number of analog and HD programming. Picture is crystal clear and sound is stereo quality. You won't be disappointed with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: Carmine J. Corica "Fun Guy"
Reviews.Content: I have bought only one thing in my 53 years that was made by Panasonic that I didn't like. I would buy Panasonic food if they made it now because everything I have bought by them has been the best quality. This 32 inch TV is for my bedroom and while we wouldn't want it any bigger, I love the big screen. Setting it up and connecting it to cable and my TIVO was fast and easy. The instructions were clear. I may never have to buy another TV for my bedroom for the rest of my life!

Reviews.Title: For use as PC Monitor
Reviews.Author: Josh Hinnenkamp
Reviews.Content: Most people see this product as a small, needlessly-sharp HDTV with a high-quality IPS panel......but, for those of us who see this as a HUGE adequately-sharp PC monitor with a high-quality IPS panel, I'll base my review on this usage, and post the following tips to make the setup a little less painful:ATI video chipsets only:-By default there will be a 15% overscan compensation for HDMI output (including DVI to HDMI cables and adapters.) In the latest version of Catalyst Control Center (CCC) navigate to Desktops and Displays > My Digital Flat-Panels > Scaling Options.  Set Overscan to 0% and click [Apply.]  There may be a similar procedure for nVidia and Intel chipsets.Only tested on ATI, probably the same for everyone:-On your TV/remote, [MENU] > Picture > Aspect Adjustments.  Select Screen Format: FULL & HD Size: Size 2. You should now have edge-to-edge 1:1 output.Everyone:-Set Sharpness slider to 0.-Disable A.I. Picture and C.A.T.S.-I know this is counter-intuitive, but you want to ENABLE "Video NR" (noise reduction.) This will remove edge distortion and dramatically improve the readability of text.-Adjust ClearType. Press [Windows key] to open the start menu and begin typing "cleartype" > Adjust ClearType Text.--For those of you hooking this up using an analog connection, first of all, completely disregard my setup tips above -- most of them won't apply to you.  If you hook your TV up through your video card's VGA output, a menu option will be accessible called "PC Adjustments."  I'm not sure if this is anything more than image alignment. I haven't explored this menu, because I'm only interested in digital output.--This is the first time I've used a dedicated HDTV as my PC display.  I was strongly considering returning it until I figured out the Video NR setting made text more readable.  Now, I have to say, I'm enjoying it pretty much, and it's a serious upgrade from my old Hanns-G 27.5" TN panel monitor.  Still, it doesn't seem like all of the image enhancement features of the TV can be disabled, making pixel-perfect output on this display impossible.  For people like graphic artists, this might be a deal-breaker.  I'm basing my four-star rating on this lack of unadulterated output. TV, video, and gaming are all fantastic of course.Other minor gripes-Like most TVs but unlike most computer monitors, there is no tilt adjustment.  The viewing angles on this TV are very good, but unless you're at least five feet away from the screen, you're going to want to adjust the tilt.  You can prop it up on something or consider your mounting options.-The buttons on the remote could be a little more rubbery (hey, I told you these were minor gripes!)-The response time is not as fast as the lower-quality TN panels generally used in computer monitors. It's still extremely good, and only noticeable in the kinds of extreme color transitions generally used as reference tests.  On a positive note, I have not noticed any input lag.**Please comment on this review if you have any additional tips or questions on using this HDTV as a computer display.  If you want to post your backlight/contrast/brightness/color/tint/color temp/black level settings, make a note of who's video card drivers you are using.  Last time I checked, nVidia's drivers, by default, used "digital vibrance control," which would undoubtedly throw off anyone trying to replicate your settings.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Bedroom Sized TV
Reviews.Author: brudemi
Reviews.Content: We love the Panasonic brand for TVs.  This TV has great picture and is the perfect size for our bedroom. The picture is very clear.  The one thing I woudl like better about the TV is the sound.  We have not set up a sound system in our bedroom and the sound from the TV is not great... its good.. just nothing to rave about.  I have a panasonic 42" plasma TV from a few years ago, and I felt that the sound coming from that TV was better.For the cost of the TV, which for us was about $378, I think this was an amazing value.  At the time of purchase Amazon had a price match and I found on another website for less and Amazon was very quickly able to refund the difference.  We received the TV amazingly fast - literally I order on a Tuesday morning at 8am and receievd by 4pm on Thursday - and this was with the free shipping.Obviously there are better TVs out there - either from Panasonic or other manufacturers, but they also generally cost more money. Also, the prices of TVs change so rapidly it is difficult to rely on my review.  I purchased my TV in mid Nov. 2010, and it has worked great since then (about a month).  When you consider the cost, this TV is very very good and I would recommend. Also, not only did we receive the item quickly but as you can tell from the review, the item was received fully intact and operational.  Until a few years ago, I always worried about buying muti-hundred dolar electronic equipment over the internet becuase I was always concerned it woudl be received broken and then I woudl have to pay to ship some large item back.  I have not purchased two TVs from Amazon.com and have not had a problem with either purchase.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture
Reviews.Author: Rebec
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate and setup.  Lightweight.  Great picture!  Great for setting up with a multiple of external media, such as camera, DVD, and VHS.

Reviews.Title: Viewing angle isn't great.  Good TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: C. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV for the price but it has two shortcomings: the viewing angle is wide but not tall, and it only has digital audio output.First, the positive qualities:  Good price, good picture quality, 1080p, many inputs, good backlight distribution, clean design, straightforward configuration menus.  As a bonus, its right side has all the essential buttons you need - power, input, volume, channel, etc.  That's one less remote you need.The viewing angle is the TV's weakness.  Panasonic claims 178 degrees horizontal viewing angle, but they don't tell you that the vertical viewing angle is far less.  The TV must be at eye level or it will appear washed out.  As you move further left or right from center, the viewing angle gets shorter!  Standing dead center, the vertical viewing angle is probably 90 degrees.  But, standing ~60 degrees off center, the vertical viewing angle is shorter than the screen.  This means that even at eye level, the top and bottom of the screen appear washed out while the center has the right contrast.Another problem with the TV, though minor, is that the only audio output is digital.  This makes it more difficult to use a few-year-old amplifier for the audio.  You can't run a single analog RCA cable from the TV to the amp, letting the TV input selection decide which video source's audio is played.  Instead, you must connect the audio from each video source to the amp and manually switch the amp between sources.Overall, it's a good TV for the price.  The rest of my household doesn't care about the above two issues, but you should know they are drawbacks of buying a lower priced TV.

Reviews.Title: Thrilling thity-two
Reviews.Author: Louis N. Abriola "Lou Aber"
Reviews.Content: This 32" TV is a typical excellent product from Panasonic. The picture is brilliant and the interface between it and a Pan. Bluray player is flawless. I amcompletely pleased and thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and value; I suggest this set.
Reviews.Author: G. Harrington "G.H., III"
Reviews.Content: I watch this set with over the air HD antenna; distance from broadcast towers approx. 20 mi.The picture is brilliant.CBS football is fantastic looking.I did turn down contrast and brightness.one issue, with the auto adjustment feature that fusses with the brightness when lighting of the room changes. I notice that at dusk (the room is not quite dark enough for lights to be turned on) the picture will appear too dark for my eyes.I also have a Panasonic Blu-ray; which interacts with the on/ off button of this set when hooked up via hdmi cable.LCD technology is not perfectly comparable to old style 480i tube television. But Congress has 'mandated' the change regarding the public airwave broadcast system; so no looking back to "how it used to be".The prices are hitting the sweet spot NOW. I've seen these on the Web for a couple bucks cheaper than 406. I bet they can get a bit cheaper, but will you miss a great set like this for a couple bucks?

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money
Reviews.Author: Photo buff
Reviews.Content: I have had this for about a month now and I have been very pleased with it. I have not used the speakers since I use my home audio system for the sound. But the picture is very crisp, the colors are good, and it is a dramatic improvement over my previous Sony tube TV. I, just by coincidence, also have a panasonic blue ray player and they work in conjunction with each other so that if I turn the player on the tv turns on as well, and the same remote works on both, so that is kind of a nice bonus. The only complaint I might have about it is that the image does pale some when viewed from above the straight on viewing angle, far more than if viewed from the side or from the bottom. So that is something to keep in mind with regards to placement. I have mine set so the top of it is about 4 ft off the floor. So when sitting on the couch, to the side, or the chair, in the front, or on the floor, the color is nicely saturated. But if you are walking through the room, you get the paling effect. It is not a big deal for me, since I don't watch it standing up, but I did find it interesting that the loss of quality is much more significant given the angle, from that perspective, than from the others. But for me, it nothing like a deal buster, just something to be aware of.

Reviews.Title: I'm sold on Panasonic!
Reviews.Author: birdman
Reviews.Content: Over a year ago I purchased what was at the time, a top-of-the-line 46" Panasonic Plasma TV as my primary television. I have been thrilled with the great picture especially when watching DVDs. When the TV in our bedroom died, I once again went to the library to do my homework. I specifically wanted an LCD as I couldn't get a plasma smaller than 42" and wanted something in the 32" range for the location I had in mind. I also wanted a 1080p set with the thought that as time goes on, more and more programming will take advantage of the higher resolution.I went with Panasonic again because of brand reputation and value.This TV lacks the "THX" setting of the plasma that I own; a setting that renders colors perfectly, but I managed to customize the settings to reproduce it as close as I could. Also, I had gotten so used to being able to view the plasma from any angle in the room that it was strange at first to not have that advantage (though I went into this realizing that this is one of the drawbacks of LCD). Since this TV will mostly be viewed while in bed, this was not a too  much of a problem.When looked on directly, the picture is wonderful and I sound is great! It is fairly lightweight and power consumption is much less than my plasma.All in all another great product from Panasonic with a great price from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great flat screen with amazing price-tag:)
Reviews.Author: emmanuel pascal
Reviews.Content: Well, this HD tv has great picture quality. crisp and clear and the colors look vibrant and just great!the design isnt the sleekest but its simple with a great black. this tv will be great for anyone looking for a awesome name-brand low price tv. clearly the tv is more than $400, but its worth it considering the great pic quality. 32 inchs is great for a room or small living room. but if you have a large living room i recommend buying a bigger flat screen. i have a ps3 and the blu-ray picture looks great with the amazing HD. Dont buy this tv if you are looking for a great size tv for a LARGE living room.OH yeah!! the sound quality is good too for tv speakers:)!

Reviews.Title: fantastic buy for $400
Reviews.Author: puck
Reviews.Content: ease-of-use is amazing. picture quality I would rate it a 4 1/2 stars.  the colors are magnificent.  I encourage the reader to experiment with the cool settings warm settings and normal settings first,..ease-of-use in adjusting the picture I would rate it five stars. I am no tech geek.  the sound is amazing proper manipulation gets the volume up to more than sufficient levels.. I like the fact that I can control the bass  and trebel. (for example I have a cable remote which I turned all the way up and turn down the Panasonic remote..  I turned up these Panasonic volume control and it is more than enough). the SD slot  is great it works with my Nikon digital camera.  by the way it's the only TV out there that has a SD slot. for $22 more I went from the 720p the 1080p in anticipation  of the next new thing. my cable company wants to charge me, I see that ending in the near future. the remote is easy to operate.the only thing I don't know is how the Panasonic is going to hold up.  but I've purchased other Panasonic products before and they more than hold up.

Reviews.Title: Screen size adjustment
Reviews.Author: Tony Wright
Reviews.Content: How do you correct the screen size on this. I bought this panasonic lcd specifically because LG and panasonic were the only 2 manufacturers that i knew of that had a proper zoom function. Imagine my disappointment when i got this set and found the zoom function does not work the same as thier plasma line. Only filling the screen horizontally as most other manufacturers do. And to make matters worse when connected to my pc which was the only reason for buying a 1080 set is that the screen size cannot be adjusted to fill the screen leaving a full half inch gap all the way around the screen unfilled. Yes i do know how to use all the screen adjustment functions given, i either get a stretched distorted screen which even zoom on the lowest setting over fills horizontally, or an even bigger gap of about an inch all the way around. Is there something wrong with my set? This appears to be the cheapest of cheap in panasonics line and for the price  you can find a much better set i believe.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be more pleased
Reviews.Author: Loretta H. Horrocks
Reviews.Content: We already had a 58 inch plasma in the family room, but we needed to replace the old Sony CRT in the bedroom. We wanted a 1080p resolution, but we were finding it difficult to get that in a smaller screen size. There were several lesser quality brands available but since the family room television was a Panasonic and we were extremely pleased with the way it is holding up, when we saw this one for such a good price, it was just a done deal. The picture quality, even though its an LCD, is excellent, its different from the plasma, but very acceptable and easy to watch from any angle. If it was in any room other than the bedroom, we would connect a sound system to it, but for our needs the sound is not unpleasant. I am extrememly picky about picture quality, and i am happy with this set. We use Directv, and cannot find any problem with connecting it up or with the quality of the satellite operation.

Reviews.Title: Really pleased!
Reviews.Author: Lorinn
Reviews.Content: This is a high-quality television with a low-budget price.  I am extremely happy with it, the picture is amazingly clear, the colors vivid, with the capability of fine-tuning the picture to your light and color preferences.  LOVE IT!!!!  It arrived exactly on the day it was supposed to, and I was able to track the shipping easily.

Reviews.Title: exceeded expedctations
Reviews.Author: Fred Gefken "Skeeterflyer"
Reviews.Content: This was my first flat screen purchase. It replaced an old dinosoar 27" TV that took up half the room and weighed nearly fifty pounds.The Panasonic worked right out of the box and has plenty of connection possibilities. The only audio out source however is a special type connecter with no info on where to obtain it? I would like to see an audio out for stereo's with the older style cables.Other than that, I can find no fault. The picture is magnificent and unit light but stable on its stand.I am a neophyte so can say that it has everything I want in a TV. I cant speak for experts who look for the tiniest flaw, but this unit is all that anyone needs.

Reviews.Title: Great television!  In addition to having the wonderful picture quality of LCD TVs, this televis
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: In addition to having the wonderful picture quality of LCD TVs, this television is easy to assemble.  Attaching various compenents such as DVD/VCR, Roku for streaming Netflix, etc. was simple and straightforward with no complicatiions.  With a great picture and ease of use, this is a super television.

Reviews.Title: High quality TV
Reviews.Author: Derek Gardiner
Reviews.Content: I have had the TV for about a month now. Excellent quality of picture (on Verizon FIOS). Was easy to set up. Clear menus and instructions. Excellent value for money. I may be sorry in the future I did not get a TV with Internet access.

Reviews.Title: Graet LCD TV no complains
Reviews.Author: Luis Fernanado Pelaez
Reviews.Content: I'm in Costa Rica, ordered before black Friday, It was delivered on time. Good quality, nice stereo sound and Led quality, No regrets.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great, so is the sound.  The SD slot has some lag, you really cant browse through photos.

Reviews.Title: Bought Used from Amazon - Great Deal
Reviews.Author: MarkB
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV used from the Amazon Warehouse and am very pleased with it.  I learned a lot about this TV by reading other reviews on Amazon, which is one of the reasons I like Amazon so much (that and the great prices).My brief comments:*  TV arrived on time (2 business days after ordering with Prime);*  The used condition was actually better than described on Amazon's website.  Although the website said it had minor cosmetic damage on a few parts, it must be extremely minor since I couldn't find anything significant;*  The item arrived in its original box, which had been opened (as expected) and showed wear-and-tear.  The original packing materials were inside, but the items were loose.  It's probably lucky that nothing was damaged;*  This is the third HDTV I've purchased from Amazon, and so far I'm batting 3 for 3.  I was initially reluctant to buy a TV and have it shipped (after hearing some horror stories about cases of shipping damage), but it's worked out very well for me;*  The TV works well and looks great, consistent with many of the reviews.  So far, I find it fairly comparable to my 47" LED TV (minus some of the bells and whistles), but since it cost me about 1/3 the price, it's a deal;*  I have also purchased a used blu ray 5.1 home theatre system from Amazon Warehouse to go with this TV, but it hasn't arrived yet.  However, after playing with the sound settings, I'm impressed with the sound through the TV's speakers, particularly the surround sound function which sounds good and is surprisingly three-dimensional;*  Many reviewers have mentioned that the TV doesn't have a headphone jack, and only has an optical audio out.  This is a limitation if you want to use headphones or a simple speaker system, but won't be for my home theatre system (an optical cable is also coming from Amazon);*  The SD card reader is a bonus and works fairly well.  The images look good, but it does take a while to scroll through images taken with my 12 megapixel camera.Overall, I'm very pleased with the performance of the TV, the price and the better-than-expected used condition.  I will definitely buy used products from Amazon again.Regards,  M.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic TC-L32U22
Reviews.Author: John Wilkins
Reviews.Content: I decided to use the $250 of Amazon gift cards I received for Christmas to buy a hi-def flat screen for my bedroom. I don't watch that much TV while in there, but its where my Playstation 3 is hooked up. Having just purchased my PS3 in November 2010, I really wanted something to fully utilize its technology. This TV gave me all I was looking for. A handsome, clean design that fit in its assigned space like a glove. Outstanding picture quality, and as mentioned in excellent ratings that motivated its choice, excellent range in the room from side to side without losing sharpness and clarity. Even at full price, I'd have been satisfied. At $149 after gift card credits, I am DELIRIOUS!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: JP "JP"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our master bedroom as a gift for my wife.  We have a 50" Panasonic plasma in the living room and we love the Panasonic brand.  This TV has a great, clear picture.  The LCD doesn't pop quite as well as the plasma but it is certainly a nice picture nevertheless.  Sound quality is average and not disappointing in any way.  Setup was quick, it is not heavy, and it is a good size for a larger bedroom like the master bedroom.  Highly recommended although if you have an over sized mast bedroom you might consider the 40".

Reviews.Title: A good purchase for the price
Reviews.Author: Leann Garza "Leann"
Reviews.Content: This is our first HD flat screen tv. Didn't want anything too big for the room so we got the 32", which was an upgrade from our older 27". Wonderful picture, love the high def channels, but really great for playing video games too. I am happy with this purchase, even though it's only been two months since we got it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the $
Reviews.Author: Sojukilla "Sojukilla"
Reviews.Content: Frist delivery... TV did not work... returned to seller and a new TV arrived.  It works fine.  Sound quality is just OK.  Picture quality and everything else is good.  Although it was annoying to receive a broken TV and had to deal with the return process, happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent with HD channels, mediocre sound
Reviews.Author: Mark Tafel
Reviews.Content: This TV was very easy to install at home.  I had to change the my cable service to HD by handing in my old box for an HD box.  So the pleasure of seeing actual HD was delayed.  The HD channels are stunning, but the other channels are mediocre at best.  What has been most disappointing is the sound quality.  My 11" Magnavox I bought years ago had more interesting sound.  I suppose I might have to look into home theater sound systems to compensate for the poor quality of the Panasonic sound.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I have ever bought
Reviews.Author: Romany
Reviews.Content: I have bought lots of TV's over the years and I must admit that I had become a Sony fan. That is until I decided to buy this one. It is far and away the best TV picture quality I have ever encountered and includes great features.I will definitely be buying more as I replace my old TV's around the house.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Sharon M. Hosmer "teacher mom"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV. In the past I watched very little TV, not now.  This television has a great picture and I am finding myself watching TV more, as well as enjoying movies. I am certain anyone will like this TV--just turn it on and the picture is excellent all the time. Exercise DVD's are awesome--it's like being right there with the instructor.  What a great experience!  This TV is only 32 inches, but it's feels like you are watching a larger screen.  To sum it up, this is the best TV we have owned and three of our friends have purchased this TV.  If you do, make sure you have a great easy chair or sofa.

Reviews.Title: great tv and great deal
Reviews.Author: LAURA CLINE
Reviews.Content: This is the first tv we ever purchased on line, we read the other reviews and are very happy with this tv.  Very easy hook u, great picture especially nature programs.

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Curious consumer
Reviews.Content: The set arrived a day earlier than expected, which was welcomed :) Fits perfectly on the wall unit, colors are beautiful, easy to change from Cable to Video. Was our first purchase through Amazon, very pleased with you service!

Reviews.Title: Most excellent
Reviews.Author: Joan E. Maus
Reviews.Content: We got the best price and the quality has not been disappointing at all.  The box came earlier than expected and nothing was damaged at all.  Panasonic is a great brand and the picture quality is superb.  Really glad we were able to find this deal.  Highly recommend using Amazon.  They have always provided good products when I have found deals on them.

Reviews.Title: A good value for the technology (at the time)
Reviews.Author: R.S.
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up and quality Panasonic 32" TV.....1 month after install and the 2 TVs are doing well for their intended gaming and TV use..I had to get them when I did knowing that LCD prices would continue to drop through the holiday season..but I believe I got the best deal at the time I made this purchase decision and I'd rather have a reliable brand like Panasonic than go for a no-name/entry brand..

Reviews.Title: I love it, and Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: D. Gray "yargnad"
Reviews.Content: Great TV for a great price. I wasnt concerned with super-size nor 120Hz and this TV was the best candidate.  It looks great with both standard(!) and hi-def signals. With my new Roku XD|S and Netflix, I may not need cable in the future. I got this shipped overnite to my door for only $3.99 with my Prime account; cant beat it with a stick!

Reviews.Title: Really good product
Reviews.Author: Michael Fortson
Reviews.Content: Works great. Easy set-up. Excellent picture quality. Bought Panasonic sc htb10 soundbar to compliment the tv, and together they work very well.

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL - EQUAL TO MY PANASONIC 42 INCH PLASMA
Reviews.Author: Suzie B. "flight risk"
Reviews.Content: I was so happy with my first flat-panel - a Panasonic plasma - that I only considered one other tv brand, the LG, because 1) my friend's set is really nice, and 2) it had a direct headphone output, which is essential for me (I live in an apt with thin walls, so must use headset at night).  But the LG was far pricier than this TV, and I trust the Panasonic name/experience.  Since this TV only has an optical, digital output for sound, I simply ordered a Toslink digital, optical cable from Amazon for a couple bucks and hooked into my Sony home theatre, which has a headphone jack.  The sound is adequate with the tv's speakers, not great.  (The Sony surround system is turned on and off automatically with the tv when "home theatre" is chosen for speaker output in the Viera menu, no additional "programing" required).  The picture quality is the same as plasma.  With this tv's IPS system you can look at the screen from any angle and see clearly.  It is hanging on the wall tilted 10 degrees and the picture is simply stunning.The menus are simple to use.  The colors are vibrant, fantastic preset picture selections for gaming, cinema watching like Netflix (using PS3/Wii), or using custom settings for night time viewing.  It is energy star compliant too.  Plenty of inputs 3 HDMI's, computer, SD card, etc.  It was hung using a VideoSec tilting 32" to 60" wall mount (they have a 23" to 37" that might work as well for a little cheaper) - got through Amazon.  This tv WEIGHS 21 POUNDS without the stand, and was easy for this senior citizen to wall mount alone.  ONE YEAR PARTS AND LABOR WARRANTY.  I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: K. Cox "Queen rocks"
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome!  It arrived within a few days, set up was easy, easy and we're so happy with picture, sound...and especially the great price!  Wonderful value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great television, but sound quality is not the best
Reviews.Author: JustNik
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television to replace an old box. I read some of the customer reviews and still decided to make my purchase. The television is great if you plan to use it as a second television in your home. The sound quality is not the greatest. I find myself turning the volume up to 50 to actually hear things a bit more clearly when watching my shows. Overall, I'm okay with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: nice for the price point
Reviews.Author: charles greaves
Reviews.Content: I held out before going to flat screen. I should note that we do not use cable or Sat. TV. We watch some HD local, mostly news and the rest is Netflix.We purchased this to replace our tube type TV when it finaly died. Honestly its OK, not mind blowing-ly better, just pretty good. We mostly watch older shows, so that possably some of our perception.It is nice to be able to access instant download movies now, and the fact it takes up less space is good. Most of the features are easy to access, some are far from intuitive, but with some acclaimation its not bad.Sound quality using the built in speakers is only passable. If you turn up the volume enough to hear subtle diologue, the action sequences are much to loud. Connecting it to a home theater system will make it wonderfull, but its an additional cost. I discount the need for a "bracket" as an equal cost, because any TV requires a stand or some sort of furniture, but sound wasn't something I imagined paying extra for. It worked out though.All in all it seems a good product, I somehow imagined the 1080 would be superior to my old TV, it really isnt, its an even trade. Perhaps going to a more expensive version would net better picture quality. It suits my needs, and if your not a fussy viewer Im sure it will suit you as well.

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again
Reviews.Author: AbbyQ
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom and finally decided I needed to listen to sound with headphones. Too bad. This television has one HUGE issue:  there is only digital audio out. No analogue RCA outputs. Of course no headphone jack. I don't really want to buy a whole receiver sound system just to deal with this digital output issue. So I considered a digital to analogue converter box. Reading the comments on Amazon, it is difficult to figure out -- There are differing audio signals in broadcast, and not all converters can handle. When the techies find this a challenge, what about regular folks?  I had no idea this single type audio output is the new "standard". I think the manufacturers are dreaming if they think we are all ready to accept such a narrow format. Seems premature. I also have a Sony Bravia - wish I had bought a second one instead of this. Sony's picture is better, the outputs are more flexible.

Reviews.Title: not one of my better purchases
Reviews.Author: Imelda Netsel
Reviews.Content: the picture is not clear; actually fuzzy.  would not purchase another one.  attempted to return it after 60 days but the guarantee had run out.

Reviews.Title: Still working
Reviews.Author: Philip Tavano "tarryask"
Reviews.Content: We have only had it a few yesrs but it is still working fine.The picture quality is very good.Also the sounf is very good also.For the price it seems to be agoof buy, so far.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture!
Reviews.Author: Filipe Sousa
Reviews.Content: This TV has excellent picture when hooked up to a high definition signal source. I had it for a year now and still love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Resolution and Value
Reviews.Author: Jose L. Crespo
Reviews.Content: Great set, nice picture and black tones.  The audio is great and the Ipod link is awsome, it charges and plays both movies and music.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: UTMom13
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  Bought this 32 inch as a Christmas present Christmas before last.  Still works great, and has a beautiful, sharp HD picture!I liked it so much, I bought myself the 50 inch this past Christmas, to replace my old big screen TV.  I've only been using it for 6 months, but so far, I am well-pleased with it.  Sometimes, the picture "fuzzes out" for a split second (don't know if this is a "plasma thing", or what),  but, for the most part, it has a great, clear, sharp picture.  Well worth the money.  Would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Buen Tv
Reviews.Author: Vic Elias Prado
Reviews.Content: Muy buen tv se ve bien el menu es muy sencillo y con blue ray se ve muy nitido aunque pudiera ser mejor

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: KAD
Reviews.Content: The TV showed up as expected. I like the TV because it has a good picture from the side. LED TV's have the wrap of not having a good viewing angle, this one does and that is why I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J Huevos
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for a smaller room. It has an excellent picture, great sound quality and is easy to operate and setup. We are very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: SC
Reviews.Content: I have had this since March and I am very happy with the television.  Easy to set up and great picture.

Reviews.Title: Not quite right
Reviews.Author: C. Houle
Reviews.Content: Great TV when it works.The problem is the connections to the signal source.1. No S-Video Connection.2. All of the provided connections are unreliable.a. When you start the TV  there is no picture or sound. Youo must play with the connection (any and all connections) before the connection works.b. The connection is lost with no warning. Again, you must play with the connection before the connection is restored.I've tried all of the connections with multiple sources and cables to ensure that the problem is not with the source (Cable Box, DVD Player, etc.) or the cables.I always purchased Sony Trinitron in the past, but decided to try Panasonic based on the reviews.Big Mistake.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: hannahhvpa
Reviews.Content: purchased this television as a gift to me after much shopping around for both price and quality. i wanted a 32 inch size screen, made from a reliable mfg, that was sleek and would fit in my bedroom, not overpower the room. i am very pleased with my choice. the tv was easy to set up (i'm a 72yr old woman and not mechanically inclined, the picture is clean and the colors are vivid. the price was the best to be found and i did a lot of checking. delivery was very quick. another great buy thru amazon.....

Reviews.Title: A real stinker...
Reviews.Author: J. Gilliland "Pill Roller"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in January and kept it at my house until my granddaughters birthday. Last Friday was the big day.  She was overjoyed that she finally got a good TV to enjoy.  I took it to her house and hooked it up for her.  When we turned it on, lights on the screen flashed, the red power light flashed several times, then nothing.  I worked with it as I consulted the trouble shooting guide.  Still nothing. I would like to return it to Amazon where I bought it, but they're saying it's been over 30 days and I'm out of luck.I guess I'm left to the mercy of the manufacturer.  Hopefully they will take it back!I have a 50 inch version of this TV that we've been using for over a year and it's AWESOME.Too bad Panasonic can't be more consistant in their products!

Reviews.Title: Completely satisfied with purchase!
Reviews.Author: A J Klima
Reviews.Content: From beginning to end our purchase was very satisfying.  Used reviews from Amazon, placed order and received product (early) in excellent condition.  What more could we ask?  Actually, the TV is better than reviews led us to believe.  Sound, if set correctly, is more than adequate.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV!
Reviews.Author: Lenna
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my motor home bedroom.  It lived up to my expectations and then some.  It has a clear picture and decent sound, an added plus is the DVD player.  I have used it several times and I am extremely pleased!

Reviews.Title: Much better than the 32 it replaced.
Reviews.Author: B. J. Kimberlin "Smoke"
Reviews.Content: It looks and performs better than the Viewsonic it replaced. Much easier to "tweek" and weighs about half of the older one it replaced. Over all very satisfied with it!!After 6/8 months of use, I have found that it is impossible to format with the TV remote or satellite remote or combination of both??

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Biscuit
Reviews.Content: I read a great deal of reviews and thought that this is the TV for us,and it was.  It preforms better than I expected.  It is in our master bedroom and we both love it. The sound works great and the picture quality works great for us. I will purchase another one just like this one for our other bedrooms in the future.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: I'm satisfied with the purchase, everything is perfect, everything arrived at the expected time, recommend it, in a good product

Reviews.Title: Nice LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Serious Reviewer
Reviews.Content: It's a nice affordable LCD TV with great image quality, I can recommend it to anyone, just be sure to buy extra AA batteries for the remote control, the ones that arrives with the TV don't last a week, about the sound it's ok, not have troubles with volume level as others said.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Jack Reid "Jack"
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased as an upgrade for an old 'low def' model. That was a Sony Trinitron model, one of the best of it's class. This TV is better in every way.The TV came well packed and arrived in great shape.Setting this up was very quick and easy. High def TVs being much wider and less tall than old style TVs, I had to obtain a stand about 8" tall on which to place this TV so that it was easier to view once it was placed in my entertainment center.The picture quality is excellent.There are many connection options provided. I am using a composite connection from my VCR and HDMI from a Blu-ray player. It's easy to chose the right input.I cannot comment on the sound capabilities of this TV. I run all the sound from the video sources directly through my  tuner.I am very happy with this purchase and recommend this TV wholeheartedly.

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: richard Curry
Reviews.Content: The product is great LCD TV. Great price and the picture is great. Makes a 32" Monitor for my PC

Reviews.Title: Perfect choice
Reviews.Author: John Hanlon
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use in a bedroom. I bought the Panasonic based on thehigh number of positive reviews it had received. I was not sorry. The picturequality is near perfect, and there are more than enough inputs.Setup was a snap. I did change some of the factory settings, but it was straightforward.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding LCD
Reviews.Author: Rott boy
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this outstanding Panasonic 32"LCD.  Lifelike and detailed 1080P picture quality, ample HDMI inputs, up-to-date styling with simple quick set-up.  All the positive Amazon reviews made this model my first choice.  Unit was purchased used from Amazon's Warehouse Central supposedly in "like new" condition.  With the exception of the factory box, the flat screen TV was in near mint condition.  Looks like it was opened and immediately re-packed.  Hard-to-beat price point w/ immediate delivery are additional reasons to highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quality high performance 32" LCD.

Reviews.Title: Geat Choice for Me.
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Got this TV to replace one in our "back room". Everything about it has been great. The only drawback from my point of view was that it had only one coax input, so while I could hook it up to cable, I couldn't attach an antenna at the same time to watch on-air channels in case the cable was out for some reason.

Reviews.Title: Nice small TV
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn
Reviews.Content: This TV works perfectly for me. I got it quickly and in one piece and it worked straight out of the box. I sit about 8 feet away from the TV so the 32" works perfectly for me.

Reviews.Title: A pleasure from start to finish!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Illiterate newbie"
Reviews.Content: From the moment I clicked buy, everything to do with this tv has been great.  The packaging was easy to remove and the assembly and connection was easy even for me the technologically challenged.  The look of the tv and the picture are both excellent and we are glad we bought 2, one for each bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at an exceptionally good price
Reviews.Author: janetkh
Reviews.Content: Love my new TV. It is easy to install, beautiful picture and sound and am totally enjoying it.Did a lot of shopping around including to Costco and this is by far the best deal.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I Ever Had
Reviews.Author: DrumrGirl
Reviews.Content: This Panasonic TV plays the best picture I ever had, right out of the box.  No adjustments.  Great color & clarity.  Takes longer to turn on, but that's no big deal if you don't mind waiting about 10 seconds.  Took only 3 days to arrive, too.  Panasonic equipment always performs very well for me.  Great TV for the price!

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: Hafez70
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV with great picture.  Blue Ray hook up/picture is the best!! I use it in my bedroom.  Panasonic builds good quality products.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: A. Maldonado "Al"
Reviews.Content: This product is a nice fit for the bedroom. Very easy to set-up in the matter of minutes. The only thing if allowable is the ability for the remote control to operate other devices.

Reviews.Title: Just OK. Need to add speakers. Very dark.
Reviews.Author: R. W. Milyard "GearJunky"
Reviews.Content: TV was up and running in less than an hour from receipt.The picture quality and sound are ok, when running through the TV receiver, but when playing DVD's both the sound and picture quality are degraded by quite a bit.I had to add some small powered speakers to my VCR/DVD machine (Eagle, arion 2.0)and have had to run the back light to 80, and brightness to 90 in the best mode available on the menu. I understand that the flat screens are not as bright as regular CRT TV's, (and probably never will be) but this TV makes you adjust to the extreme.If I would have know these problems existed, I would not have purchased the TV.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic 32 in.Flatscreen
Reviews.Author: kk-lovethe80's
Reviews.Content: Have had this Flatscreen for a month now, and love it!!  Considering we were still using the "old-style" huge TV, this Flatscreen is a beauty to have!  I was a little worried when ordering as to whether or not the TV would survive the "shipping".  Packaging was GREAT! TV arrived in excellent condition, with not a scratch!  I'd suggest it to any of my friends!

Reviews.Title: MAGNIFICENT!
Reviews.Author: BethelsPride
Reviews.Content: I DID A LOT OF RESEARCH BECAUSE THIS WAS THE FIRST TIME I PURCHASED AN HD TV WITHOUT THE ASSISTANCE OF OTHERS.  SO, I WANTED AN EDUCATION.I HAVE A SAMSUNG FOR THE LIVING ROOM SO I FIRST REVIEWED THEIR PRODUCTS FOR THE 32" TV.  ALSO REVIEWED SEVERAL OTHER BRANDS INCLUDING THIS PANASONIC.  AFTER CONFERRING WITH MY SATELLITE PROVIDER'S TECHNICIAN AND READING THE REVIEWS I DECIDED ON THIS PANASONIC FOR THE MASTER BEDROOM.THIS PRODUCT IS AWESOME IN NEARLY ALL FACETS.  THE ONLY EXCEPTION IS THE SOUND QUALITY WHICH IS ACCEPTABLE.  BUT I EXPECTED THIS BY READING SOME OF THE OTHER REVIEWS.  SOMEONE SUGGESTED PURCHASING THE PANASONIC SOUND BAR; I HAVE CONSIDERED THAT BUT HAVEN'T DONE SO.I BELIEVE THE QUALITY OF THIS TV FAR EXCEEDS ITS PRICE.  WONDERFUL INVESTMENT.

Reviews.Title: a good TV
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Kulikov
Reviews.Content: A nice TV for a small room. The picture is great, the sound is good and loud enough. The only con that I have is the remote. I's really love to have a separate button for picture mode. The current setting is not easy to get to. And yes, CC could be a little bigger, and switching channels  - a little faster.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic LCD HDTV review
Reviews.Author: Ayele Chernet
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV. I bought it because of the good reviews I read. So far I am very happy with this TV. Excellent value for waht I paid for it thanks to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: First Panasonic... won't be the last.
Reviews.Author: John J. Arvai
Reviews.Content: This was my first Panasonic and I haven't been disappointed.I received the package 3 days after my order even though I chose the free shipping 5-7 day option. Amazon on top of their game per usual.Setup was a breeze. The picture is FANTASTIC.  The sound isn't the greatest but better than I was expecting. Remote well laid out. Set looks very sharp.Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase and will look Panasonic's direction for future TV purchases.

Reviews.Title: Great for a bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I replaced a 37" 720P LG that died 14 months after I purchased it, I purchased this used from Amazon Marketplace in "good condition" for $280, although the box was in pretty rough shape, the TV was in perfect Aesthetic shape, no dead pixels and the picture is superb, sound quality is more then adequate for a bedroom.  The IPS panel is a noticeable difference from the old LG that I had, the picture quality is superb and more then enough for HDTV STB with time warner, and I plan on getting a Roku box to do some netflix streaming, should work perfect for that use.

Reviews.Title: Happy about this product
Reviews.Author: Philip_C
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV, I really like the image quality, it is excellent, the TV is easy to setup and use as well.Only weakness: the sound quality could be better, but that's why sound systems have been created I guess!The shipment took around 8 working days which is ok.

Reviews.Title: Great Choice!
Reviews.Author: busy1
Reviews.Content: The TV was very easy to set up.  Easy remote.  Excellent picture. Sound not as clear on some channels as I would like but overall I would buy this TV again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase for the Price
Reviews.Author: snipe
Reviews.Content: This was my first HDTV purchase and I researched extensively before buying. For the amount of money I wanted to spend, I wanted the most bang for the buck. In the $400 and under bracket, this is it. I've owned the set for a little over a month and am quite happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Harry C. Rivell
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this TV except for the sound.  Volume sometimes not adequate or needs to be cranked up to hear what is being said.  Great picture, ease of use and hookup and is nice looking as well.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great value
Reviews.Author: Scott Livingston
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month and so far, I have been very pleased with it. Picture quality is outstanding--even standard definition channels look nice--and the features and connectivity options are very good (I wish it had an analog audio-out port, but few HDTV's do anymore). The built-in speakers are good but not great. A couple of minor annoyances--there is a bit of a delay when you turn the unit on, and also when changing channels--but I believe this is fairly typical among similar LCD TVs. You may wish to play around with the picture settings--the default was very dim for me. It also took a bit longer to set up than I expected (the base requires some assembly).If you have (or plan on getting) other Panasonic Viera products, you'll like how they work together seamlessly.The size works well in our small living room, but if you want a TV for a larger space, you should think about getting a larger size.

Reviews.Title: very nice and what a great price
Reviews.Author: Scott Dunn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a Christmas gift for my daughter. This was a great buy and free shipping. A very nice HDTV.Scott

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommended!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Lauxman
Reviews.Content: Everything works great with this TV. Love that it is FULL HD 1080p. Could not go with a 720p tv....would highly recommend this tv for someone looking for 32in class tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Conure "Vet"
Reviews.Content: This TV was very easy to set up and use. The picture and sound are great. The price was very good. I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: best picture we have seen
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kurtz "Desert Gal"
Reviews.Content: I shopped for this for my own Christmas gift so my husband didn't have too much input but when it was up and working he was more than impressed. The picture is the best either one of has seen.  There was just one problem. The TV had a square type sound cable that did not match up with typical three pronged cable on our Bose speakers. Now we are in the process of calling both companies to see what they would suggest. I would rate it a perfect 5 had it not been  for the sound cable.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch`1080
Reviews.Author: Larry Johnson
Reviews.Content: Purchased for the bedroom but find that this LCD could function very well in any room with consideration to the 32" size.  Picture is very good, ease of use also good.  Quite happy with this purchase and would recommend this LCD to anyone looking for a LCD of this size with an excellent price to match.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, not disappointed
Reviews.Author: sharall58 "Sharall58"
Reviews.Content: I already own the 720p of this model but this was such a good buy and I needed a replacement for another television so I ordered this.  I'm not disappointed; beautiful picture, great sound,the delivery was quick and the set up was very easy. Under $400.00 and it's a Panasonic quite a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: K. Gerber
Reviews.Content: Great price on a very nice tv.Has a great picture and sound.The only problem I had was not with the tv it was delivered and left on my front porch a couple of days befor xmas.Thank goodness we got home from out of town before it disappeared.

Reviews.Title: Compared side-by-side with LED,,,LCD still wins!
Reviews.Author: A. Donabed "The re-view-R"
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQ', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; } cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQloadSwf_Core(swfLocation, swfWidth, swfHeight, flashVersion, bgColor, swfParams, flashParams, embedAttributes); return false; } function cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { return _cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion); } var node = cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQcurrentClick) { return cv_mo1POCWRSPOFLTQcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 3:29 MinsJust got mine in the UPS from Amazon and setup was a snap. I was a bit worried because I've heard LED has a better picture quality. Well that may or may not be true, in my own opinion, compared side by side at Cosco, I like this LCD 1080 better. I hope this unit lasts a while. I wont want to have to come back a few months from now with an updated review saying how horrible this TV is. :)Sounds quality wise, this is just fine for the bedroom. It's even good for a descent size living room. If you do put it in your living room I (along with everybody else) would recommend getting surround sound speakers.Overall a great TV and the best you can get (not including 3D of course) Oh and the VIERA picture viewer thing is awsome! YOu can view your jpeg photos with crystal clear clarity.In closing, BUY THIS!! For LCD its the best!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic is Proving to be a Reputable Company
Reviews.Author: Condrichthyes
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV through Amazon over 6 months ago and am still very happy with the quality of the unit, picture, sound, and features.  One of my main peeves about technology is the navigation of menus and settings.  This TV is very easy to set-up and intuitive in common, everyday use.  Since purchasing this TV, I have added a Panasonic Blue Ray player with Netflix and Amazon Video access through ethernet. The DVD player integrates very well with this Panasonic TV.  Also, I agree with another comment - don;t go cheap on the 780 resolution on cheaper sets.  Buy 1080!

Reviews.Title: IPS panel type
Reviews.Author: Altruist
Reviews.Content: I sent an email to Panasonic Technical Support asking the IPS panel type. Here is their response:Thank you for your inquiry. The panel used in this model is an IPS panel, design by Alpha. You are a valued customer to Panasonic and we appreciate the opportunity to support you. If you need to contact us in the future regarding TC-L32U22 or any other services please refer to your case# noted at the closure of this correspondence. To obtain additional information you may contact us at: [...]. Our hours of operation are Monday through Friday 9 AM to 9 PM - Saturday and Sunday 10 AM to 7PM Eastern Standard Time.

Reviews.Title: pan tc-32u22-32
Reviews.Author: james "jim"
Reviews.Content: this is a great tv for the money the only reason i gave it 4* is because if you are lookijnd at the screen vertically it is cloudy unless veiwed strate on.i have mine in an entertainment system and it is eye level when sittinb down but when you stand up the pic is cloudy and out of focus.horizontally its fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellant TV for the money
Reviews.Author: W. M. Mccombs "bmccombs"
Reviews.Content: This TV has lots of features for the money.  I havent tried any of the inputs except the standard cable input.Excellant product ...  hard to find a 1080p for this price.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv for the money...
Reviews.Author: cupocoffee2
Reviews.Content: IT does what need it too, providing computer support, and being able to tie into the Cable/Satellite feed at the school.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Gamer
Reviews.Content: samsung is remaining consistent with it's plasma offerings and bringing back the 550 offering which was a big seller last year. i liked the tvs from  last year and i am  looking forward to reviewing it again. Some of the features and qualitative measurements were different this year, but we still enjoyed the TV a lot. the actual quality of the televison is very detailed and amazing. but the sound is just terrible it sounds good and all but its not very loud in my old tv is was crappy but way better sound. i was expecting more. also i cant seem to find anywhere to plug in a head set so it makes it not as easy to game. but not bad i recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: gar874
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with the over-all quality and price on this hdtv. A week after receiving it from Amazon.com, I viewed the same unit on sale for a lower price at Sears and compared it to several other competitor hdtv units while I was there. I thought the 1080 resolution would make it outperform, however, I would have purchased a 720 LG or Samsung, had I viewed them prior to ordering it online. The setup routine/menu was more complicated than it needed to be. The service and delivery through Amazon.com was excellent!

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: charlie brown
Reviews.Content: I always like panasonic products. This is a high quality TV at an extremely attractive price. I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Zachary Williams
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a basic flat screen to this one and, wow. A big difference in picture, simply amazing. I gave sound only 3 stars due to the fact that I use it as a computer monitor and my sound go through my speakers

Reviews.Title: 32" Panasonic TV
Reviews.Author: S. P. Raucci "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: So far, this tv performs very well and we are pleased with the picture quality.  For the price it was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Exc compra
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: Compré este producto en Dic 2010, el envío fue rápido y seguro, la instlación sumamente sencilla, la imagen y sonido, son de muy buena calidad. Lo instalé en mi habitación y la visión desde cualquier ángulo es excelente.Es un excelente producto de Panasonic, la navegación por el menú es muy fácil y el control remoto es muy amigable.La capacidad para ver fotos vía tarjeta de memoria es muy agradable y lo convierte en un exc pantalla.Recomiendo la compra de este producto.

Reviews.Title: 32" Panasonic Flat Panel TV
Reviews.Author: D. Hilliard
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price and size.  The 1080p is definitely worth the extra money.  The 720p is just not a clear enough picture with all of the technology available out there.  Never go with the 720p to save a few bucks. You will be sorry you did later.

Reviews.Title: This Tv is niiice
Reviews.Author: Leeza "~GraceRose~"
Reviews.Content: Got it for Christmas! its nice I didnt mount mine on the wall!I wish it had a USB outlet but no tv does! LOL

Reviews.Title: packing and shipping condition
Reviews.Author: avi patel
Reviews.Content: I was totally blown away by the condition this tv was shipped.!!!!!!!It was in its original box which was damaged, thank god the tv itself was not damaged ,I opened and checked before I picked it up from ups.All tv's come with styrofoam  all around it, not this one. I was disappointed and will never order tv's from amazon.
